keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
#  Safari Extension Vimari
map q previousTab
map w nextTab
map h goBack
map l goForward
map H scrollLeft
map L scrollRight
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode
map s LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
# https://github.com/philc/vimium/wiki/Key-Mappings#helix
map zh scrollToLeft
map zl scrollToRight
map gh firstTab
# map gp previousTab
# map gn nextTab
map ga visitPreviousTab
map gl lastTab
map e Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map E Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map \ passNextKey
map ch closeTabsOnLeft
map cl closeTabsOnRight
map co closeOtherTabs
# map <space> scrollPageDown
# [left hand mode](https://github.com/philc/vimium/issues/1455#issuecomment-80618649)
map a Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map ; Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map J nextTab
map K previousTab
map gp goPrevious
map gn goNext
unmap <a-p>
map <c-p> togglePinTab
unmap <a-m>
map <c-m> toggleMuteTab
unmap <a-f>
map <c-f> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant

# https://github.com/philc/vimium/wiki/Search-Engines
l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
recent: https://www.google.com/search?hl=en&tbo=1&tbs=qdr:y&q=%s Google (last year only)
translate: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#auto|auto|%s Google Translator
w: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
b: https://www.bing.com/search?setmkt=en-GB&q=%s Bing
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub
hn: https://www.hnsearch.com/search#request/submissions&q=%s&start=0 HackerNews
so: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s StackOverflow
su: https://superuser.com/search?q=%s SuperUser
sh: http://symbolhound.com/?q=%s SymbolHound
# Use google to search the current site you're on
site: javascript:location='https://www.google.com/search?num=100&q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s'
